channel.title: Backup Folder
channel.description:
okay..
When you download any sources there is Client.java.
In the scape folder you create a folder called Backup.
an then you put the Client.java in there.
help????:
ok. when you have 100 errors you think "GOD DAMMIT" right.
then you have a copy in your backup.. then u say " YEAAH " ;D
you can also:
Copy all the source in there. so if you have errors in other Files you can change it hurry :)
---- thx Puré_Pk

okay…

When you download any sources there is Client.java.

In the scape folder you create a folder called Backup.

an then you put the Client.java in there.
